G4ParticleDefinition * aprimeDef_

Detailed Description

Defines basic APrime physics.

Note:
This class basically does not do anything except define a dummy particle so that event generation works properly.

Definition at line 26 of file APrimePhysics.h.

void ldmx::APrimePhysics::ConstructParticle ( )

Construct particles.

Insert A-prime into the Geant4 particle table. For now we flag it as stable.

                0.003 * GeV, /* mass */
                0, /* width */
                0, /* charge */
                0, /* 2*spin */
                0, /* parity */
                0, /* C-conjugation */
                0, /* 2*isospin */

                0, /* baryon number */

                0, /* decay table */
